Trusted by thousands of top operators

“Table22 is a rare win-win-win for the restaurant, the guest, and the platform. It has enabled us to drive 7 figures of new sales across subscriptions and retail, while helping us nurture guest relationships and extend our brand.”

— , Rose’s Luxury (Washington, D.C.)
Aaron Silverman 
“Working with Table22 has allowed us to focus on the fun parts of our wine club, while they handle the hard stuff.  It doesn’t feel like you’re working with a 3rd party; they take the time to get to know your business, the people, and the needs.”

— , Macchialina (Miami, FL)
Jacqueline Pirolo 
“Partnering with Table22 was an excellent idea, and allowed us to increase revenue without the operational impact of regular take-out. Their team is very organized and very pleasant to work with — always a step ahead and ready to assist.”

— , Sarma (Somerville, MA)
Fernando Neves

Grow your sales, not your workload

Table22 powers your storefront, processes payments, does customer service, creates branded marketing, and handles fulfillment — all under your brand

Automated marketing

Launch campaigns, track conversions, and retain members using CRM tools built specifically for hospitality

Unified commerce

A customizable checkout built for subscriptions, memberships, and pre-orders

White-glove logistics

Our fulfillment network handles the complexities of in-person pickup, national shipping, and local delivery

Getting started with Table22 is fast, easy, and free to try

We'll design your program, build your storefront, and get you selling — all with no upfront cost
Design your program 
We'll help you build the right subscription, membership, or pre-order program for your business — based on what's worked for thousands of operators like you
We handle the hard parts 
Storefronts, payments, delivery logistics, customer support, and marketing – managed for you

New revenue, from untapped customers

80% of subscribers haven't visited in the past year — we let you monetize patrons who love your brand but can't always walk through the door

Made by you, powered by Table22

For busy operators, Table22 takes the headache out of subscription growth.

Our platform unlocks predictable revenue, strengthens guest loyalty, and provides a creative canvas for sharing and discovery.
